# TypeScript 类

# 基础用法

class People {
    name: string;
    age: number;
    constructor(name: string, age: number) {
        this.name = name;
        this.age = age;
    }
    print() {
        return `${this.name}: ${this.age}`
    }
}
let p = new People('Jamse', 30);

# 类的继承

派生类（子类）Doctor继承与基类（超类）People，通过super() 去复用父类的构造函数。

class People {
    name: string;
    age: number;
    constructor(name: string, age: number) {
        this.name = name;
        this.age = age;
    }
    print() {
        return `${this.name}: ${this.age}`
    }
}

class Doctor extends People {
    school: string;
    constructor(name: string, age: number, school: string, ) {
        super(name, age);
        this.school = school;
    }
    print() {
        return `${this.name}: ${this.age}: ${this.school}`
    }
}

let p = new Doctor('李四', 20, 'middleSchool');
console.log(p.print());

# 公共，私有与受保护的修饰符

public | private: 以下代码中，public 为公共属性或方法（默认），父类子类都可以访问，private为私有属性或方法，只能在定义类中使用，子类中无法使用。

class Dog {
    public name: string;
    private age: number;
    constructor(name: string, age: number) {
        this.name = name;
        this.age = age;
    }
    sayName() {
        console.log(`${this.name}:${this.age}`)
    }
}

class SmallDog extends Dog {
    address: string;
    constructor(name: string, age: number, address: string) {
        super(name, age);
        this.address = address;
    }
    sayName() {
        /*  */// 这里是访问不了age的 属性“age”为私有属性，只能在类“Dog”中访问
        //console.log(`${this.name}:${this.age}:${this.address}`) 
    }
}

let sd: Dog = new SmallDog('lucky', 3, 'huoying');
sd.sayName();

protected: protected受保护的属性和方法只能在子类或父类中使用，不能在类外部调用。

class Dog {
    public name: string;
    protected age: number;
    constructor(name: string, age: number) {
        this.name = name;
        this.age = age;
    }
    sayName() {
        console.log(`${this.name}:${this.age}`)
    }
}

class SmallDog extends Dog {
    address: string;
    constructor(name: string, age: number, address: string) {
        super(name, age);
        this.address = address;
    }
    sayName() {
        console.log(`${this.name}:${this.age}:${this.address}`) 
    }
}

let sd: Dog = new SmallDog('lucky', 3, 'huoying');
sd.name = 'wangwu'
// 属性“age”受保护，只能在类“Dog”及其子类中访问
// sd.age = 20;
sd.sayName();

# readonly修饰符

readonly关键字将属性设置为只读的。 只读属性必须在声明时或构造函数里被初始化

class Dog {
    public name: string;
    protected age: number;
    readonly attr: string = '动物';
    constructor(name: string, age: number) {
        this.name = name;
        this.age = age;
    }
    sayName() {
        // 只读属性是赋值不了的
        // this.attr = '222'
        console.log(`${this.name}:${this.age}`)
    }
}

# 存取器

set 和 get 截取对对象成员的访问。 它能帮助你有效的控制对对象成员的访问

et passcode: string = '123131313';
class Circle {
    private _fullName: string = '';
    
    set fullName(newName : string) {
        if(passcode) {
            this._fullName = newName;
        }else{
            console.log('ERROR!');
        }
    }
    
    get fullName() : string {
        return this._fullName
    }

    sayName() {
        console.log(`${this._fullName}`)
    }
}

let C = new Circle();
C.fullName = 'bob';
C.sayName(); // bob
